tool_description: Scans the network to discover available door and window sensors within range, identifying their types, IDs, and connection status.

network_interface.description: Network interface to scan (wifi, zigbee, z-wave, bluetooth)

scan_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for discovery scan (10-300)

include_offline.description: Include previously paired but currently offline sensors

error_messages: Network interface not supported: Use one of [wifi, zigbee, z-wave, bluetooth]
Scan timeout out of range: Must be between 10-300 seconds
Network interface unavailable: Check that the specified interface is enabled and functioning
usage: Specify the network_interface to scan for sensors. Optionally set scan_timeout and include_offline flag. Returns discovered sensors with their details.

sensor_types.description: Array of sensor types (door, window, motion)

connection_status.description: Array of connection statuses (online, offline, weak_signal)
